articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: A BBC diversity group has emailed all staff members to express their disgust at the broadcaster's 'totally inexcusable' decision to stand by Michael Vaughan.
articles.content:
Michael Vaughans role with the BBC is under review after the broadcasters diversity groups branded the decision to stand by the former England captain totally inexcusable and embarrassing.

articles.description: Gabriel Jesus is edging ever closer to a transfer to Arsenal, but he'll leave Manchester City with fond memories.

articles.description: Coventry City transfers from CoventryLive as League One club reported to be interested in Sky Blues wing-back
articles.content:
